original_title: GG Allin & The Murder Junkies: Terror In America Live 1993
overview: After spending time in a NYC studio recording their final album together, GG was ready to continue his onslaught against society and anyone else who stood in his way. His anger had escalated and he was spiraling completely out of control.
title: GG Allin & The Murder Junkies: Terror In America Live 1993
